==Profile==
Jurieu is a researcher who worked as [[Edwin Eastinghouse]]'s assistant, and [[Lourvine]] worked as one of Jurieu's assistants. Like Edwin, Jurieu researched [[Arkhium]] and gravimeters. Jurieu was then hired to become [[Wriothesley]]'s technical consultant.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Secret Keepers and Forbidden Zones}}</ref>
